channel.title: Archives on Imperial College Mountaineering
channel.description: Recent content in Archives on Imperial College Mountaineering

item.title: Club archives, 1929-1951
item.description: A compilation of the club’s history from 1929-1951 was found in the club archives (a.k.a Box of Doom). You can find tales of the club’s early days, the origin of the ULMC club hut in the Peak District, and various accident reports from the 1930’s. Click here to download
